title: Person of Interest - 5x13 'return 0' - A Good Friend
author: POISuit
comment: I loved how they gave John one more realistic/Jason Borne type fight to go out with. One of the best parts of the show.

OMG......I so love this show and SO miss this show!  The friendship between Harold & Mr. Reese was awesome.! I'm lost without POI....wandering around like a heroin addict looking for the needle.  Lord, I need help......
I love how we finally get a different voice from John, from the whisper tone, to something much different
completely heartbroken.can't stop crying every time i watch this.
This scene just made me cry so hard. Emerson and Caviezel brought their A game to the series finale.
